about.title: About X-CIRCLE-X
about.subtitle: The first decentralized tontine platform on MultiversX

what.title: What is X-CIRCLE-X?
what.description1: X-CIRCLE-X is a revolutionary platform that reinvents the traditional concept of tontine (ROSCA - Rotating Savings and Credit Association) using MultiversX blockchain technology.
what.description2: Our mission is to democratize access to collective savings and microcredit by eliminating intermediaries and ensuring total transparency through smart contracts.

circleOfLife.title: The Circle of Life
circleOfLife.intro: At the heart of X-CIRCLE-X is the Circle of Life: an ecosystem of interconnected smart contracts where tokens circulate daily automatically and transparently.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1: SC0 is the central contract that orchestrates the entire system
howItWorks.step2: Each member creates their own peripheral SC (SC1, SC2, SC3...)
howItWorks.step3: Each day, 0.001 EGLD circulates from SC0 to SC1, then SC1→SC2, etc.
howItWorks.step4: Members must sign before midnight (UTC) to validate the transfer
howItWorks.step5: The cycle completes when funds return to SC0

rewards.title: Rewards System
rewards.item2: Starter Bonus: bonus for starting the cycle
rewards.item3: Pioneer π% Bonus: +3.14% permanent for the first 360 SCs
rewards.item5: Claim Sunday: claim your rewards every Sunday (UTC)

penalties.title: Warning: Penalties
penalties.description: If a member does not sign before midnight UTC, the cycle fails and their SC is banned for 30 days the first time, then 60 days the second time, and so on. After 360 successful cycles, the ban counter resets to 30 days. Funds automatically return to SC0. Auto-signature is available to avoid forgetting!

step1.title: Join the Circle of Life
step1.description: Pay the entry fee (1 EGLD) to create your peripheral Smart Contract. SC0 becomes co-owner with you.

step2.title: Wait for cycle start
step2.description: Every day at midnight UTC, a new cycle can begin. Anyone can start the cycle and receive a starter bonus.

step3.title: Sign your transfer
step3.description: When it's your turn, sign before midnight UTC to transfer 0.001 EGLD to the next SC. You can also pre-sign or enable auto-signature.

step4.title: Earn rewards
step4.description: With each successful cycle, you accumulate XCIRCLEX tokens. Claim them every Sunday (UTC) to receive them in your wallet.

step5.title: Evolve your NFT
step5.description: The more cycles you complete, the more your reputation NFT evolves, unlocking additional staking bonuses.

blockchain.title: 100% Blockchain
blockchain.description: All transactions and data are stored immutably on the MultiversX blockchain.

smartContracts.title: Smart Contracts
smartContracts.description: Rules are encoded in audited and transparent smart contracts. No manipulation possible.

dao.title: DAO Governance
dao.description: Members vote for new memberships. The community controls the circle.

fees.title: Low Fees
fees.description: Only 3% fees on distributions, much less than traditional tontines.

fast.title: Fast & Efficient
fast.description: Instant transactions thanks to MultiversX. No more waiting days.

global.title: Accessible Everywhere
global.description: Participate from anywhere in the world. Only an internet connection is needed.

q1.question: What is a tontine (ROSCA)?
q1.answer: A tontine, or ROSCA (Rotating Savings and Credit Association), is a collective savings system where a group of people regularly contributes to a common fund. Each cycle, one member receives the entire pot. It's a traditional financial mutual aid method used in many cultures.

q2.question: How to join an existing circle?
q2.answer: To join a circle, navigate to the Circles page, select an open circle for recruitment, and click 'Request to join'. Existing members will vote to approve your application.

q3.question: How much does it cost to create a circle?
q3.answer: Creating a circle is free. Only blockchain transaction fees (gas) are charged, usually a few cents in EGLD.

q4.question: What happens if a member doesn't contribute?
q4.answer: The smart contract ensures that distribution can only happen if all members have contributed. Delinquent members can be reported by the community.

q5.question: How are funds distributed?
q5.answer: Funds are distributed according to the order of member registration in the circle. Each member receives the full pot once during the circle's lifetime.

q6.question: What are the fees?
q6.answer: X-CIRCLE-X charges 3% fees on each distribution. These fees are used to maintain the platform and fund its development.

q7.question: Are my funds secure?
q7.answer: Yes, your funds are secured by the smart contract on the MultiversX blockchain. No one, not even the X-CIRCLE-X team, can access your funds without your authorization.

q8.question: Can I leave a circle in progress?
q8.answer: Once you have joined a circle and it has started, you cannot leave before the end. This ensures system integrity for all members.

q9.question: How does voting work?
q9.answer: When a new member requests to join, all current members can vote. A majority of positive votes is required to accept the new member.

q10.question: Is X-CIRCLE-X available on mainnet?
q10.answer: Currently, X-CIRCLE-X operates on the MultiversX devnet. Mainnet launch is coming soon.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.step1Desc: Admin finalizes the IDO within 24-48h. Contract status changes to "Finalized".
nextSteps.step2Desc: 80% of collected EGLD is used to create the XCIRCLEX/WEGLD pair on xExchange. LP tokens are locked for 12 months minimum.
nextSteps.step3Desc: Once finalized, you can claim your XCIRCLEX! The "Claim" button will appear automatically.
nextSteps.step4Desc: After claiming, you can trade on xExchange, stake for APY, or participate in the Circle of Life!
